tech.barbero.http.message.signing

Interface HttpMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpRequest, HttpResponse

    public interface HttpMessage
    HTTP messages consist of requests from client to server and responses from server to client. This interface expose the minimum surface for the purpose of http-message-signing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHeader(String name, String value)
      Adds a header with the given value to this message.
      List<String> headerValues(String name)
      Returns all the values of the headers with a specified name of this message.

    • Method Detail

      • headerValues

        List<String> headerValues(String name)
        Returns all the values of the headers with a specified name of this message. Headers and associated values must be ordered in the sequence they will be sent over a connection.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the header of which values are returned.
        Returns:
        values of all headers with a specified name.

      • addHeader

        void addHeader(String name,
               String value)
        Adds a header with the given value to this message.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the header.
        value - the value of the header.
